clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Repeat Doses of ACU-4429 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Double-Masked, Multiple Rising Dose Study of ACU-4429 in Healthy Male and Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of repeated doses of a new investigational drug (ACU-4429) in healthy human subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety as measured by adverse events, physical exam, ECG, vital signs, laboratory tests and visual tests

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics as measured by plasma ACU-4429 drug levels

intervention.description: administered orally once a day for 14 days
